attributes.action: Legalise Cannabis in the UK for Medicinal purposes & recreational use also
attributes.additional_details:
Legalising Cannabis for Medicinal purposes to treat / relief things such as pain & anxiety 
By legalising it for recreational use this would also in turn lower the UK’s crime rate and free up more needed space inside uk prisons for more potentially serious crimes.
Other countries such as the States (USA) have already benefited from legalising Marijuana.
attributes.background:
To legalise Cannabis in the UK for Medicinal purposes & recreational use also.
Allowing cannabis to be consumed for either Medicinal purposes or Recreational use.
